entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023
